TopicTitle: Rockets start going opposite direction of the direction I am steering.

Articles.Content: I play on Xbox Series S and Xbox Series X. During flight my rocket controls start out performing well. Then, without anything new happening to the rocket, no staging taking place, no collision, all of the sudden I will try to steer in a direction with my joystick and my rocket ends up going in the opposite direction. This occurs with pitch, yaw and roll controls. Sometimes just one of the 3  but could also be 2 or 3 of the 3.
